SEARCH

Uses of Class
org.file.Writing

Packages that use Writing
Package
Description
org.db.connecting
Package that have files responsible for Establishing connection with DB (Connection.java) Getting all data from DB (Data.java) Getting details for logging in (LoggingIn.java)
org.db.manage
Package that have files responsible for Adding or deleting questions (Adding.java & Deleting.java) Sorting DB (Sorting.java) Preparing String to further usage (StringOperations.java) Changing password/login (ChangePassword.java) Storing current table (SQL.java) Getting answers and questions in String array (ToStrings.java) Getting info about records in current table (SQL.java)
org.db.reset
Package that have file responsible for reseting whole DB Reset.java
org.db.tables
Package that have files responsible for managing tables Adding tables (Add.java) Deleting tables (Delete.java)
org.ui
Package that have Other packages admin others hq questions score tutorial Main class (Main.java)
org.ui.admin
Package that have files responsible for letting user set up correctly quiz AdminOther.java AdminPanel.java Logging.java Manage.java NewPassword.java ShowAll.java TableAdd.java TableDelete.java TablesChange.java TablesManage.java
org.ui.admin.others
Package that have files responsible for same things as mother package but there wasn't anymore space, so I moved it here, files that it contains Credit.java Info.java NoQuestions.java WrongPassword.java
org.ui.hq
Package that have file responsible for calling other classes that show questions (HQ.java)
org.ui.questions
Package that have files responsible for Showing questions Closed ones (QuestionABCD.java) Open ones (QuestionOpen.java) About date (QuestionDate.java) True or false ones (QuestionTrueOrFalse.java)
org.ui.score
Package that have files responsible for letting user know if his answer was correct Correct.java Incorrect.java
org.ui.tutorial
Package that have files that are responsible for showing tutorials Normal one - Tutorial.java For admin AdminTutorial.java
